【世界第三人！】能與尼馬爭王的就是他！
2018年07月03日06:13

能和尼馬爭王的，就是夏薩特了
　　世界盃16強，比利時完成瘋狂大逆轉，他們在落後2球的情況下，連扳3球戰勝日本晉級8強。隊長夏薩特又一次成為了關鍵先生，他在比利時瘋狂反撲的過程中送出了1次助攻。並且在賽後被評為了MVP，這也是他本屆賽事第3次被評選為全場最有價值球員。

　　從OPTA統計來看，夏薩特今場送出了5次威脅傳球，為全場最高，並有5次成功的過人，被對方侵犯5次，並完成了1次助攻。他的數據非常漂亮。比利時的第2粒扳平比數的入球正是來自夏薩特的傳球，第74分鐘，夏薩特在禁區左側拿球，他先是往回帶，隨後突然一個變向轉身，將日本後衛甩在了身後，隨後用左腳送出一記高質量的傳中，費蘭尼高高躍起將球砸入了球門。


　　有項數據能夠體現夏薩特對比利時的重要性。算上16年的歐國盃，夏薩特已經在連續7場比賽當中不是自己完成入球就是助攻隊友破門，他總共製造了9個入球。在本屆世界盃，夏薩特在第一場面對巴拿馬的比賽中送出了1次助攻，在面對突尼西亞比賽中，夏薩特完成了梅開二度，今場對陣日本的比賽中也送出了1次助攻。在2016年的歐國盃當中，夏薩特在參加的4場比賽中送出了1粒入球與4次助攻的成績單。他是比利時在攻擊線上真正的核心。

　　今場夏薩特又被評為了MVP。在他本屆世界盃參加的3場比賽當中，夏薩特全部獲得了MVP，只要他上場他就是球場上最閃耀的那個人。同時，夏薩特攻入2球助攻2球獲得MVP3次，這也是本屆世界盃賽場上唯一一個做到如此壯舉的球員，就連美斯C.朗拿度也沒能做到這點。


　　應該夏薩特能夠貢獻如此高效的數據，並不是特別令人意外，畢竟他早已經是世界級的球星了。但在本屆盃賽當中，夏薩特令人印象最深的是他變成熟了，他開始真正意義上帶領著這支球隊前進，他有了領袖的氣質。夏薩特本屆盃賽作為球隊的隊長出戰，在他身上能夠明顯感覺到責任感。

　　比如說今場在比利時0-2落後日本時，轉播鏡頭就捕捉到了夏薩特揮舞雙手來鼓勵隊友不要放棄的畫面，他眼神堅定，充滿了鬥志。夏薩特的這種行為也多多少少激勵了隊友，這才有了比利時最後時刻的絕殺。


夏薩特榮獲今場MVP
　　高圖爾斯說：「我認識夏薩特超過了10年，從來沒見過他在訓練場上如此拚命，他像是換了一個人。」夏薩特立誌在本屆世界盃當拿出一個好成績，他目前27歲正處於職業生涯最巔峰的時期，他不想再浪費比利時國家隊的天賦。夏薩特自己說：「比利時也許是時候要閃耀了，我們國家隊的實力一直很強，但過去幾屆大賽令人遺憾。但現在我們積累了更豐富的經驗。」


夏薩特是比利時真正的隊魂

　　如今，比利時已經闖入了8強，在他們通向世界盃巔峰的道路上，還有巴西這一隻攔路華(Rover)。夏薩特想要率領球隊取得一些成績的話，就必須要跨過巴西這個障礙。同時對夏薩特個人來說，這也是他與尼馬之間的對決。如果他臨場發揮好於尼馬，比利時的晉級希望就大。從本屆盃賽來說，夏薩特也是世界盃金球的有力爭奪者，當然前提是他們能夠走得足夠遠，甚至是晉級決賽。



　　（Cinderella）

Chelsea open to Barcelona offers for Willian to fund summer spending

Chelsea are open to selling Willian to Barcelona to help fund their own summer transfer business.

The Blues are in talks to sign Russia’s £27million World Cup midfielder Aleksandr Golovin, Juventus defender Daniele Rugani and Roma goalkeeper Alisson Becker.

As has been the case in recent years, Chelsea will balance any signings with sales. Alisson will only be signed if Thibaut Courtois joins Real or Atletico Madrid, while David Luiz could be heading out to make way for Rugani.

Chelsea want to sell Danny Drinkwater for over £30m, but they would also be prepared to cash in on Willian if Barca can get near to their £60m valuation.

I’m still the boss, Antonio Conte tells Chelsea in new row

Antonio Conte has clashed with Chelsea over pre-season plans and the date the players are due to resume training even though he is not expected to return to Stamford Bridge this summer.

The Times has learnt that a member of Chelsea’s technical staff emailed the players who have not been at the World Cup asking them to report to the club’s training ground on Saturday and Sunday for fitness tests, with Conte responding by saying that he is still the manager and does not want the players back until next Monday.

Conte is expecting to be sacked with Chelsea having lined up fellow Italian Maurizio Sarri to replace him, but he has yet to be told his fate by the club. His reply to Chelsea’s email to the players is understood to have been terse, bringing back memories of his infamous text message to Diego Costa 12 months ago in which he informed the Spain striker he was not required for the following season. That remarkable exchange was also prompted by a discussion of the club’s pre-season plans, with Costa’s request for four extra days off before returning to training leading Conte to reply, “Hi Diego, thank you, but you at not in my plans.”

Conte’s relationship with Chelsea’s hierarchy has been fraught since, and worsened after numerous rows over the club’s recruitment policy during the past two transfer windows, leading to his belief that he will be dismissed this summer. The 48-year-old still does not know what is happening, however, with the club engaged in brinkmanship over his severance package.

Under the terms of a new two-year contract he signed last summer, Conte is entitled to be paid for a further 12 months until he takes another job, with Chelsea even obliged to make up any difference in his salary in his next position for a year, which has left them facing a compensation package of well over £10 million. Conte’s salary is £9 million, but if he is dismissed Chelsea would also be forced to pay off his nine assistant coaches and members of his backroom team, who would not be retained.

Chelsea had been hoping that Conte would receive attractive job offers this summer to limit their compensation bill, but managerial posts at Paris SaintGermain, Real Madrid and the Italian national team have already been filled leaving him no obvious or immediate employment opportunities. As a result, Conte has decided to take a year’s sabbatical while being paid by Chelsea if he is sacked, as revealed by The Times last month.

Conte is adamant he will not resign despite the collapse of his working relationship with Chelsea and their determination to replace him. He has spent the last few weeks while on holiday in southern Italy planning a tough pre-season campaign for the players. He is due back in London this weekend and plans to hold his first training session next Monday, if he has not been sacked.

Chelsea have been negotiating with Napoli for several weeks to secure the release of Sarri, but have yet to reach an agreement with the Italian club despite the fact that they have already appointed his successor, Carlo Ancelotti. Sarri’s personal terms will be far easier to finalise and he has already held talks with Chelsea about potential new signings, with his preferred targets including Napoil forward Dries Mertens, CSKA Moscow midfielder Aleksandr Golovin and Juventus defender Daniele Rugani.

韋利安：要KO夏神

【now.com體育】周五世界盃8強大戰巴西將惡鬥比利時，屆時在英超車路士並肩作戰的韋利安與夏薩特將各為其主，韋利安就揚言要擊倒夏神。
「他（夏薩特）是個非常謙虛的球員，在球會時每天跟他一起感覺很好。但如今只得劃清界線，各自為國爭光，希望最終勝出的一方是我吧。他是世上最出色的球員之一，但我們現在壁壘分明，我會做盡一切去爭勝。賽事過後，我們當然繼續是好朋友。」29歲的巴西中場韋利安（Willian） 說。
除了夏神，屆時他還會面對車仔門將泰拔高圖爾斯。
在16強對墨西哥一戰表現備受讚賞的韋利安，今場預計續任正選，他認為球隊已完全入局，「自從首場（分組賽打和瑞士1:1）之後，巴西的表現一場比一場好。第1場是有點緊張，但之後漸入佳境。我想球隊現時的水平，跟之前在外圍賽的水平差不多。我自己比起4年前的一屆就更加成熟，更富經驗，球隊比起上屆表現亦更加穩定。」

Sarri合約情況

車路士未能係7月1日前同Napoli傾掂Sarri既轉會費，所以Sarri既8m解約金再次生效，根據合約條款，即使有球會比足8m，Sarri亦只能係2019年7月落實加盟新球會。

解決問題方法有3個

1: Sarri律師從法律途徑向Napoli申請解約。

2: 雙方傾掂轉會費，Napoli即時放人

3: 用球員交換領隊，Ancelotti想同Luiz重聚。

方法1: 睇黎唔可行，由6月研究到依家都做唔到野

方法2: Marina之前連5m都唔肯比，即使依家比足8m解約金，以Marina同拿玻里主席De Laurentiis既關係，Napoli冇咩理由肯即時放人

方法3: 5月份Napoli曾經提議過既方案，但遭車路士拒絕

目前談判情況:

Sarri合約條款同年期就一早傾好，雙方仍然商討緊轉會費，暫時無任何突破性既進展，但車路士已經根據Sarri既轉會target展開收購既工作，不過只係初步同球員經理人接觸，短期內唔會有球員落實加盟



足球總監情況:

為左協助Sarri適應工作，車路士係較早時間提議任命Zola作為Sarri既助手。

Zola一直係電視台擔任世界杯評述既工作，6月尾Zola係節目中表示因”處理前途”既理由而提早辭去工作，佢亦係翌日回程番倫敦。

然而，Zola番到倫敦之後，車路士就無再接觸過Zola。Zola經理人表示自己開始等到唔耐煩，佢亦透露要等到Sarri上任之後，Zola先會同車路士展開談判。

即係要等到幾時? 連Zola自己都唔知。



Pre Season情況:

Conte堅決唔會辭職，但到目前為止，車路士仲未接觸過Conte商討前途問題。Conte本人亦未知自己會唔會負責pre season訓練，但佢已經準備好一連串高強度既訓練內容，一旦Sarri未能及時上任，Conte願意歸隊帶領訓練。

雖然Conte願意履行合約，但球會仍未決定批唔批准Conte接管訓練。根據消息指，Conte 通知球會佢會係7月9日歸隊，但車路士擅自Email通知球員7月7日開季，令Conte覺得不受尊重。

而較早前落實轉投Derby既體能教練Chris Jones獲Derby批准，Part Time負責車路士既訓練工作直至8月，暫時協助loan group既季前訓練。一旦球會決定禁止Conte帶隊既話，隨時無進入”無教練”既狀態，到時好可能係Jones, Hilario, Cudicini負責first team既訓練。



分析Conte留隊可能性

Hawks估計機會極低，原因如下:

1. Conte同高層既關係已經完全破裂 (詳情見link)
2. 會引起更衣室內亂，Willian, Luiz, Rudiger, Hazard等人已經先後公開抨擊過Conte既戰術或處事手段
3.球員會申請離隊，包括Luiz同Willian，有消息指Hazard會因此而唔續約。
4.影響轉會操作，高層唔會為一個即將離隊既教練買人，即使買人都係會跟球會target買人，唔會聽Conte支笛

考慮到球隊士氣、核心球員前途、新球季競爭力，即使Sarri未能上任，相信球會都會係最後階段出手炒人。

距離轉會窗關閉仲有1個月多d (8月9日)，而高層既效率，要係咁短時間搞掂晒教練、足球總監，球員買賣，真係祝你好運….

根據《每日郵報》周六報道，車路士班主阿巴莫域治（Roman Abramovich）拒絕了英國首富Jim Ratcliffe收購球會的要求。

據報道，Jim Ratcliffe向阿巴莫域治提出以20億英鎊（約220億港元）收購車路士，但遭到拒絕。這名俄羅斯油王早前亦已經拒絕了來自中國的收購要求，並表明無意放棄車路士。

現年65歲的Jim Ratcliffe是做石油化工生意起家，是Ineos集團的創辦人兼行政總裁，根據上月英國《泰晤士報》公佈的富豪排行榜，他的身家為210億鎊，是目前的英國首富，比起阿巴莫域治的93億鎊，多出超過兩倍。另外，Jim Ratcliffe是出了名的曼聯球迷，但由於他居於倫敦，所以不時前往史丹福橋球場觀看比賽，亦是車路士的季票持有者。而他本身亦是瑞士球隊洛桑的班主。
